resources.string: This is smart bike lock system
Don\'t have an account? SIGN UP

The Docky is a smart bike rack system that allows the users to park their bike at home, school, shopping malls, and any other public place that allows for bike access. This bike docking system comes with an app that controls the locking system and will let you know how long the user has parked their bike for. If the bike rack is located at a high traffic area, the property owners can add a payment system to the bike rack. Otherwise, the rack is free and is a first come, first serve system. When payments are required, they work similarly to a parking garage system where you pay for the time spent in a parking spot, the user will be billed hourly through the app after taking the bike off the rack.
What is Data ih Home fragment?
Data represents information from sensors and show it in your Home screen. The main idea is that user can always take a look at their hardware information.
What is hardware used in this project?
We use 3 main components of our hardware: Weight Sensor - send and information about lock status. LCD Display - Display username data. Solenoid - stands for lock process of your bike

The "Dock" button move user to an dock screen which is responsible for solenoid activation. Also user can see all information about how long his bike in lock state and he can see rate for every second or minute of docking.
Yes! Every user allowed to change his account credentials any time he wants. You can change you username, email and password in "Settings screen" by clicking "Edit" button.
When I login for first time I have 100$ on balance. What is it?
Every user with registration gets and 100$ as bonus money for using our hardware. Also every user can put more money on his account by navigating to payment screen.
Map activity is usewd to determine exact position of your hardware. So in case if your friend wants to use it, he can choose it from Map.
Yes! Evry user is allowed to delete his account. You can just navigate to Setting fragment and click "Delete Account" button.
Here you can see location\n of lock systems from the maps and after you choose it click lock/unlock to put or take you bike from system

A weight sensor is a device that measures the weight or force applied to it. The purpose of a weight sensor is to provide accurate and precise measurements of weight or force, which is also used in our Android App!
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
